definition: To make practical use of something, often with the intention of achieving a specific purpose or benefit. It is commonly employed in various contexts, such as in discussions related to maximizing resources, taking advantage of opportunities, or utilizing tools and skills effectively.

examples.german: Ich nutze mein Smartphone, um im Internet zu surfen.
examples.english: I use my smartphone to surf the internet.

examples.german: Wir sollten die vorhandenen Ressourcen effizient nutzen.
examples.english: We should use the available resources efficiently.

examples.german: Du kannst diese Gelegenheit nutzen, um neue Fähigkeiten zu erlernen.
examples.english: You can use this opportunity to learn new skills.

examples.german: Die Firma nutzt moderne Technologie, um ihre Produktivität zu steigern.
examples.english: The company uses modern technology to increase its productivity.

examples.german: Er nutzt seine Kontakte, um an Informationen zu gelangen.
examples.english: He uses his contacts to access information.
